title: Access Alchemy
creator: Level Access
description: Save valuable time by immediately deploying automated fixes for the most serious accessibility violations with our overlay tool. After you define a fix, it can be applied anywhere else that same issue resides on a system—whether that page was ever tested or not.
guideline: WCAG 2.1 — W3C Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 2.1
WCAG 2.0 — W3C Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 2.0
assists: Modifying the presentation of web pages
automated: Groups of web pages or web sites
